td.a: ANC.DT.23 Gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) and diabetes mellitus (DM) during pregnancy diagnosis

tr.td: ANC.DT.23 Gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) and diabetes mellitus (DM) during pregnancy diagnosis

div.p: If the woman's blood glucose test results are as follows, provide the necessary counselling and treatment

td.a: ANC.DT.23 Gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) and diabetes mellitus (DM) during pregnancy diagnosis

tr.td:
ANC.DT.23 Gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) and diabetes mellitus (DM) during pregnancy diagnosis:
When:
Named Event: ANC.B10.4. Diagnosis and treatment
Then:
– The woman has gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) if her fasting plasma glucose is 92–125 mg/dL – Woman with hyperglycemia, reassert dietary intervention and refer to high-level care "Hyperglycaemia first detected at any time during pregnancy should be classified as either gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) or diabetes mellitus in pregnancy, according to WHO criteria" (2)
If:
Applicability:
92 mg/dL ≤ "Fasting plasma glucose results" < 126 mg/dL
(Should Conduct REQUIRED gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) counselling)
– The woman has gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) if her 75 g OGTT – fasting glucose is 92–125 mg/dL – Woman with hyperglycemia, reassert dietary intervention and refer to high-level care "Hyperglycaemia first detected at any time during pregnancy should be classified as either gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) or diabetes mellitus in pregnancy, according to WHO criteria" (2)
If:
Applicability:
92 mg/dL ≤ "75 g OGTT – fasting glucose results" < 126 mg/dL
(Should Conduct REQUIRED gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) counselling 2)
– The woman has gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) if her 75g OGTT – 1 hour is 180–199 mg/dL – Woman with hyperglycemia, reassert dietary intervention and refer to high-level care "Hyperglycaemia first detected at any time during pregnancy should be classified as either gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) or diabetes mellitus in pregnancy, according to WHO criteria" (2)
If:
Applicability:
180 mg/dL ≤ "75 g OGTT – 1 hour results" < 200 mg/dL
(Should Conduct REQUIRED gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) counselling 3)
– The woman has gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) if her 75 g OGTT – 2 hours is 153–199 mg/dL – Woman with hyperglycemia, reassert dietary intervention and refer to high-level care "Hyperglycaemia first detected at any time during pregnancy should be classified as either gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) or diabetes mellitus in pregnancy, according to WHO criteria" (2)
If:
Applicability:
153 mg/dL ≤ "75 g OGTT – 2 hours results" < 200 mg/dL
(Should Conduct REQUIRED gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) counselling 4)
– The woman has diabetes mellitus (DM) in pregnancy if her fasting plasma glucose is 126 mg/dL or higher – Woman with hyperglycemia, reassert dietary intervention and refer to high-level care "Hyperglycaemia first detected at any time during pregnancy should be classified as either gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) or diabetes mellitus in pregnancy, according to WHO criteria" (2)
If:
Applicability:
"Fasting plasma glucose results" ≥ 126 mg/dL
(Should Conduct REQUIRED diabetes mellitus (DM) counselling)
– The woman has diabetes mellitus (DM) in pregnancy if her 75 g OGTT – fasting glucose is 126 mg/dL or higher – Woman with hyperglycemia, reassert dietary intervention and refer to high-level care "Hyperglycaemia first detected at any time during pregnancy should be classified as either gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) or diabetes mellitus in pregnancy, according to WHO criteria" (2)
If:
Applicability:
"75 g OGTT – fasting glucose results" ≥ 126 mg/dL
(Should Conduct REQUIRED diabetes mellitus (DM) counselling 2)
– The woman has diabetes mellitus (DM) in pregnancy if her 75 g OGTT – 1 hour is 200 mg/dL or higher – Woman with hyperglycemia, reassert dietary intervention and refer to high-level care "Hyperglycaemia first detected at any time during pregnancy should be classified as either gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) or diabetes mellitus in pregnancy, according to WHO criteria" (2)
If:
Applicability:
"75 g OGTT – 1 hour results" ≥ 200 mg/dL
(Should Conduct REQUIRED diabetes mellitus (DM) counselling 3)
– The woman has diabetes mellitus (DM) in pregnancy if her fasting 75 g OGTT – 2 hours is 200 mg/dL or higher – Woman with hyperglycemia, reassert dietary intervention and refer to high-level care "Hyperglycaemia first detected at any time during pregnancy should be classified as either gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) or diabetes mellitus in pregnancy, according to WHO criteria" (2)
If:
Applicability:
"75 g OGTT – 2 hours results" ≥ 200 mg/dL
(Should Conduct REQUIRED diabetes mellitus (DM) counselling 4)
– The woman has diabetes mellitus (DM) in pregnancy if her random plasma glucose level is 200 mg/dL or higher – Woman with hyperglycemia, reassert dietary intervention and refer to high-level care "Hyperglycaemia first detected at any time during pregnancy should be classified as either gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) or diabetes mellitus in pregnancy, according to WHO criteria" (2)
If:
Applicability:
"Random plasma glucose test results" ≥ 200 mg/dL
(Should Conduct REQUIRED diabetes mellitus (DM) counselling 5)

Should Conduct REQUIRED gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) counselling

/* "Fasting plasma glucose results" ≥ 126 mg/dL */ define "Should Conduct REQUIRED diabetes mellitus (DM) counselling": ContactData."Fasting plasma glucose" >= 126 'mg/dL'

Should Conduct REQUIRED diabetes mellitus (DM) counselling 2

/* "75 g OGTT – fasting glucose results" ≥ 126 mg/dL */ define "Should Conduct REQUIRED diabetes mellitus (DM) counselling 2": ContactData."75 g oral glucose tolerance test (OGTT) - fasting glucose" >= 126 'mg/dL'
75 g oral glucose tolerance test (OGTT) - 2 hours
Should Conduct REQUIRED diabetes mellitus (DM) counselling 4

75 g oral glucose tolerance test (OGTT) - 1 hour
Should Conduct REQUIRED diabetes mellitus (DM) counselling 3
/* "75 g OGTT – 1 hour results" ≥ 200 mg/dL */ define "Should Conduct REQUIRED diabetes mellitus (DM) counselling 3": ContactData."75 g oral glucose tolerance test (OGTT) - 1 hour" >= 200 'mg/dL'
Random plasma glucose
Should Conduct REQUIRED diabetes mellitus (DM) counselling 5
/* "Random plasma glucose test results" ≥ 200 mg/dL */ define "Should Conduct REQUIRED diabetes mellitus (DM) counselling 5": ContactData."Random plasma glucose" >= 200 'mg/dL'
Should Conduct REQUIRED gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) counselling 2

/* 92 mg/dL ≤ "75 g OGTT – fasting glucose results" < 126 mg/dL */ define "Should Conduct REQUIRED gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) counselling 2": ContactData."75 g oral glucose tolerance test (OGTT) - fasting glucose" in Interval[92 'mg/dL', 126 'mg/dL')
Should Conduct REQUIRED gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) counselling 4

/* 153 mg/dL ≤ "75 g OGTT – 2 hours results" < 200 mg/dL */ define "Should Conduct REQUIRED gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) counselling 4": ContactData."75 g oral glucose tolerance test (OGTT) - 2 hours" in Interval[180 'mg/dL', 200 'mg/dL')
Should Conduct REQUIRED gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) counselling 3

/* 180 mg/dL ≤ "75 g OGTT – 1 hour results" < 200 mg/dL */ define "Should Conduct REQUIRED gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) counselling 3": ContactData."75 g oral glucose tolerance test (OGTT) - 1 hour" in Interval[180 'mg/dL', 200 'mg/dL')

define function ToQuantity(quantity FHIR.Quantity): case when quantity is null then null when quantity.value is null then null when quantity.comparator is not null then Message(null, true, 'FHIRHelpers.ToQuantity.ComparatorQuantityNotSupported', 'Error', 'FHIR Quantity value has a comparator and cannot be converted to a System.Quantity value.') when quantity.system is null or quantity.system.value = 'http://unitsofmeasure.org' or quantity.system.value = 'http://hl7.org/fhirpath/CodeSystem/calendar-units' then System.Quantity { value: quantity.value.value, unit: ToCalendarUnit(Coalesce(quantity.code.value, quantity.unit.value, '1')) } else Message(null, true, 'FHIRHelpers.ToQuantity.InvalidFHIRQuantity', 'Error', 'Invalid FHIR Quantity code: ' & quantity.unit.value & ' (' & quantity.system.value & '|' & quantity.code.value & ')') end

define function ToCalendarUnit(unit System.String): case unit when 'ms' then 'millisecond' when 's' then 'second' when 'min' then 'minute' when 'h' then 'hour' when 'd' then 'day' when 'wk' then 'week' when 'mo' then 'month' when 'a' then 'year' else unit end
define function Only(observations List<Observation>): singleton from observations
define function ToString(value ObservationStatus): value.value
define function ToBoolean(value boolean): value.value
define function ToString(value uri): value.value
define function ToString(value string): value.value
